attributes.review: I tried to download this app to learn more about politics and it took over TWO WEEKS to download. Once it was downloaded every time I tried to open the app, it would kick me out and shut my phone off. Then when I would turn my phone back on, the battery would be at 1 percent! It was a terrible cycle and I couldn’t even charge my phone because it messed up everything. I had to get an entire new phone because of this horrible app!!!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.userName: a hater of this stupid app

attributes.review: the app is in terrible condition which is extremely surprising and frustrating since president trump is so rich. i honestly expected more from him. the app was glitchy and had disturbing messages that made me think he should be ashamed of himself. the app store should remove this app as soon as possible as it affects not only the way we see donald trump but also the way we evaluate Apple in general. i hope everyone has a beautiful day and remembers to wear masks in public😘

attributes.review: This is a terrible app. I hate how it looks like 0 effort was given to it. Looks like something straight out of the Middle Ages. No technology at all. Weak. Disgusting. Shame on whoever was a part of making this. I would much rather go back to playing Minesweeper on my brick of a computer in the early 2000’s than have to open this app one more time and witness the atrocity of the graphics and gameplay of the Trump 2020 app.  Gonna vote Democrat because of this. 👎
attributes.title: If I could give 0 stars I would

attributes.review: When I opened the app the most horrifying music that you could ever hear started playing and I tried to open a folder and I read “Go back to your country” I am very offended and disappointed in the government for making such a horrible app for the clown himself and also offending any other Hispanics like me. You can go ahead and leave I will hold the door right open I will be waiting for you to go through and for the world to change 😷🤢🤮
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review:
This app is horrendous.
Took weeks to download and it ended up giving my phone a virus that made it over heat and then shut it off. It was horrible and it got to the point where I wasn’t even able to use my phone. Once I took it to the phone store they were able to safely remove the app and now my phone is back to Normal. Don’t get unless you want to end up spending a lot of money to either get a new phone or to fix this one.
attributes.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND

attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch so hard that all my emails were hacked by what appears to be Russian hackers. My emails are now flooded with Russian emails and i can not change my password. That’s not even the half of this apps troubles. Shortly after downloading it hacked my Apple Pay resulting in my bank account being used for fraudulent purchases. Not only that but it tried to make me wear a mask and take a test for COVID even tho we all know it’s fake
attributes.title: I wish i could give 0 stars

attributes.review:
NEVER DOWNLOAD THIS!! takes for-freaking-ever to download, takes up loads of space, says incoherent things and accidentally gives praise to a cheeto who doesn’t deserve it!! very misleading and loves to spread false information, and either way, WHY does a PRESIDENT have an app?? it’s unprofessional and uncalled for. we do not support pedophiles, rapists, racists, etc. in this household. will never again download and would never recommend to a friend. 
anyways stream fine line by harry styles😌✨🏳️‍🌈
